name: David Ramirez
text: There's also military SF, which has quite a lot of writers and readers who like the idea of sexist/ white-savior story lines like John Ringo (who is, despite writing SF, anti-science enough to think climate change is a myth), etc.     So it's not all SF  =P      The divide is pretty stark if you check out the Sad/Rabid Puppies trolling.    Then there's those haters among the grand ole men of SF like Orson Scott Card, and some badly behaved sexists who I shall not name....
